name: Conway's Game of Life 3D
description:
Choose the rules of life and let the simulation commence! This app lets you experience the real power of Conway's game of life simulation. The simulation comes alive as cells live and die according to the rules you set for them!

The classic Conway's Game of Life is also built into the app, and you can use it by squeezing the simulation size to 1 in one direction. For more info, the latest feature video can be watched at: https://youtu.be/o7OdrfuUOYM

Have fun discovering! If you have any questions or feedback, you can contact me at: creetah.info@gmail.com.
